eval_kwargs.reference_answer: The overall framework of MemoChat pipeline is a memorization-retrieval-response loop inner thinking. Very different from traditional methods that retrieve directly on these accumulated dialogues, the chatbot will automatically builds and updates a structured on-the-fly memo, storing past dialogues in categories. Then, the retrieval is conducted over all recordings according to their topics and summaries
